about_the_game:
About

You start simple just refueling and repairing ships, but as you get more experience in your job you will be asked to do more tasks with the same efficiency or better. If you get sloppy or miss tasks you will get less money or even get fired!

Features

Currently I have these features (or minigames) planned or implemented. I'll update the page as I add more.
  • Fuel Ships

  • Repair Ships

  • Load and Unload Ship Cargo
  • Scan Ships for local infractions
  • Disinfect ships with a Sterilizer Gun
detailed_description:
About

You start simple just refueling and repairing ships, but as you get more experience in your job you will be asked to do more tasks with the same efficiency or better. If you get sloppy or miss tasks you will get less money or even get fired!

Features

Currently I have these features (or minigames) planned or implemented. I'll update the page as I add more.
  • Fuel Ships

  • Repair Ships

  • Load and Unload Ship Cargo
  • Scan Ships for local infractions
  • Disinfect ships with a Sterilizer Gun

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later (or equivalent that shipped with Linux kernel 3.2+)
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Processor or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are not final, and untested

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel Processor or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM or better (AMD Graphics, Capable of utilizing METAL)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are not final, and untested

name: Spaceport Crew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are not final, and untested
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Requirements are not final, and untested

short_description: Fuel and fix ships as fast as you can in this Simulation Time Management game.
